title: hybrid resource runes
body: would be cool if there were hybrid resource marks that give both mana and energy, would be a little op so maybe make the cost lik 1050 ip each or somefin?

replies.body: The reason they put enegery into the game is so you can't circumvent the high energy cost with runes and masteries. Allowing to get energy runes just wastes the reason to have energy champions
